for_sales.sales_text:
19ft (22.5ft with extended bowsprit) GRP Open day boat, Gaff Rigged Yacht, built by Skanner Yachts Ltd to a design by Mike Hawes.

First of type. Canoe stern with continuous sheer and heavy displacement simulated clinker round bilge hull with long shallow keel. Black superstructure, Keel hung rudder with tiller steering.

Engine details

1x Bukh 10hp DV10 inboard diesel engine with shaft drive. Temperature gauge Throttle control New thermostat & alternator 2021 Last serviced 2025

Electrical

1x 12v battery 12v socket

Spars, rigging, sails and other

Jackells sails 2011 1x Wycombe Martin Furling gear on fore sail 1x Hanked on fore sail Gaff rigged Main sail Standing rigging replaced within last 3 years Spare set of sails

Navigation equipment: Navigation lights Depth sounder Garmin 6" chartplotter/Sonar Echomap

Safety equipment: Manual & electric bilge pumps

Deck equipment: Large open deck area, floors and sole were rebuilt in 2018 Plenty of seating Teak rail Cedar Wood flooring Wooden engine cover with grey canvas cover Stern storage lockers Wooden tiller Small bow anchor locker Retractable bowsprit Mainsail cover Lines and fenders 2x Anchors Bespoke Piggy Back road trailer with launching dolly, Fully serviced by Wessex trailers in Jan 2023 (Spare wheel & wheel lock)

Lying in Weymouth on the water.

boat.full_description:
Originally a Bermudan sloop, 'Norwegian Girl' was re-rigged as a gaff cutter at Penpol, Cornwall in 1985. First of type with approximately 30 built, but mainly exported to St Helena as an inshore fishing boat fleet! Those were fitted with large diesel engines and no sailing rig. 

Norwegian Girl was originally fitted with a Dolphin direct drive petrol engine but now re-engined with a 10hp Bukh diesel. 

The sail plan was redrawn that required a much longer bowsprit and the rudder redesigned and had a new suit of sails in 2011.

In 2018 she had her floors and sole redesigned and rebuilt. The foredeck and deckbeams  renewed and redesigned to be able to retract her bowsprit. Also all electrics were updated.
boat.name: Norwegian Girl
boat.short_description: Built in 1983 as a Bermudan sloop, 'Norwegian Girl' was re-rigged as a gaff cutter at Penpol, Cornwall in 1985.
